description: The Dragon (10-3 lifetime) giving up 10lbs and 4 inches, takes on newcomer Christina Carter. Christina is a well-known fetish and glamour model. Yes, Dragon whipes the mat with her, but the unexpected happens. The glamour model fights back, and she fights back hard, with more intensity, heart and conviction then I have ever seen on the mat. Mark my words: If The Bomb sticks with it she will be a top contender at the end of this season. Until then she gets the shit fucked out of her in rd4. Sweet!
title: The Dragon (0-0) vs. The Bomb (0-0)
